name: Sarah Martinez
desc: Jesel transformed our customer success process completely. Our CSAT scores improved by 15% in just 90 days, and our support team finally has the structure and documentation they needed. Her systematic approach and attention to detail are exceptional.

name: Michael Chen
desc: Working with Jesel was a game-changer for our scaling challenges. She helped us handle 3x order volume growth while actually reducing our resolution times by 40%. Her automation strategies saved us countless hours during peak season.

name: David Rodriguez
desc: Jesel's property management expertise is outstanding. She managed our 50+ property portfolio flawlessly, maintaining 95% occupancy rates and keeping tenant satisfaction high. Her systematic approach to operations is exactly what growing businesses need.
